Backend.PreStartupCommand: wg genkey | tee privatekey | wg pubkey
Backend.PostStartupCommand: export SUBNET_IP=`echo $SUBNET | cut -d'/' -f 1`; ip link del flannel.1 2>/dev/null; echo $PATH >&2; /tmp/wg-add.sh flannel.1 && wg set flannel.1 listen-port 51820 private-key privatekey && ip addr add $SUBNET_IP/32 dev flannel.1 && ip link set flannel.1 up && ip route add $NETWORK dev flannel.1
Backend.SubnetAddCommand: read PUBLICKEY; wg set flannel.1 peer $PUBLICKEY endpoint $PUBLIC_IP:51820 allowed-ips $SUBNET
Backend.SubnetRemoveCommand: read PUBLICKEY; wg set flannel.1 peer $PUBLICKEY remove
